channel.title: Terraria Update,When will It Come?
channel.description:
Some People That play Terraria may know that there is a HUGE update for the PC.There have been many dates(the most recent past date Aug. 4th)but so far nothing has happened.There will hopefully be 5 new bosses 1 New biome and Tons of more content.It's first release date was in july But that is long past,one of probaly the most likely dates is in September.Reply if you know what the release date is,and other questions.I hope this update comes soon!:)
Update:Release is before October 1st KeepYourselfUpdated: http://www.terrariaonline.com/members/redigit.9411/ Music! http://www.terrariaonline.com/threads/music-spoiler.104031/

item.title: Terraria Update,When will It Come?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

They said they would be stopping development for a while, now they’re working on another update though

If you stay in their irc you might catch some spoilers released by the devs, don’t try to actually talk there though most of the people act like they’re 12

Read full topic

item.title: Terraria Update,When will It Come?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Last I heard Terraria was finalized and wouldn’t be receiving anymore updates.

Read full topic

item.title: Terraria Update,When will It Come?
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

I’m not sure (no one is), but we an only wait patiently so we can have a good release bug free.

Read full topic
